## Percentage of Items Sold Table

```{r 1.2.1-tbl-items-sold}

ft_items_sold <- flextable(dt01_items_sold
  ) %>%
  set_header_labels(
    item               = "Item Name",
    count              = "Count",
    pct_item            = "% Items Sold"
  ) %>%  colformat_num(
    j                  = 2,
    big.mark           = ",",  
    digits             = 0,  
    na_str             = "",  
    prefix             = ""
  ) %>%
  colformat_num(
    j                  = 3,
    digits             = 2,  
    na_str             = "",  
    suffix             = "%"
  ) %>%  
  width(j = 1,   width = 2.00
  ) %>%
  width(j = 2:3, width = 1.00
  ) %>%
  fontsize(size = 8.25, part = "all"
  ) %>%  
  fit_to_width(max_width = 8.50) %>%
  set_caption("")
ft_items_sold
```
